name: canopic_jar_lid
title: A canopic jar lid
desc:
EA 36637
 Calcite canopic jar lid in the form of the human-headed deity Imsety, belonging to Gemenefhorbak.
Imsety was one of the four ‘Sons of Horus’ who magically protected the mummified internal organs, which were stored in four canopic jars and buried with the deceased.
